docs.title: 简介
docs.text: TaskBox是一个基于标准库实现的轻量级任务调度框架。它提供了一种简单而高效的方式来处理任务之间的数据依赖关系。

docs.title: 特性
docs.text:
• 简单易用。
  • 高效的数据依赖处理。
  • 支持任务之间的数据依赖关系。
  • 支持任务之间的数据传递。
  • 支持并行和串行模式的快速切换。
  • 支持多进程模式中的异常统一处理。
  • 支持自定义任务执行器。

docs.title: 待办事项
docs.text:
• [ ] 添加更好的异常抛出逻辑。
  • [x] 更新Task支持直接传入execute_requires并能够解析args/kwargs。
  • [x] 扩展Data定义，支持从一个对象中获取多个数据（Unpack）。
  • [ ] 添加更多的测试用例。
  • [ ] 添加更多的文档。
  • [x] 添加更多的示例。

docs.title: Installation
docs.text: pip install taskbox

docs.title: taskbox.Data
docs.text:
Data class to fetch value from data.

Parameters:

Name Type Description Default data Any

The data from which to fetch the value.

required name Optional[str]

The name or key to fetch the value from the data. Defaults to None.

None

Raises:

Type Description TypeError

If the name is not a string.

KeyError

If the name is not found in the dictionary data.

AttributeError

If the name is not found as an attribute in the data object.

Examples:

  1. Fetch value from dictionary: data = {'name': 'Dongbox'} name = Data(data, 'name') print(name.value) # Dongbox

    df_dict = {"i_source": DataFrame(data={"a": [1, 2, 3], "b": [4, 5, 6]})} i_source = Data(df_dict, 'i_source') print(i_source.value) # DataFrame(data={"a": [1, 2, 3], "b": [4, 5, 6]})

  2. Fetch value from object: class Person: def init(self, name, age): self.name = name self.age = age

    person = Person('Dongbox', 30) name = Data(person, 'name') print(name.value) # Dongbox

  3. Fetch value from python basic type (int, float, str): data = 10 value = Data(data) print(value.value) # 10

docs.title: taskbox.Data.value: Any property
docs.text:
Property method to fetch value from data.

Returns:

Type Description Any

The value fetched from the data.

Raises:

Type Description KeyError

If the key is not found in the data.

AttributeError

If the attribute is not found in the data.

docs.text:
Get the value of the attribute or item corresponding to the provided key.

Parameters:

Name Type Description Default key str

key of the mapping value

required

Raises:

Type Description TypeError

If the key is not a string.

KeyError

If the key is not found in the names sequence.

Returns:

Name Type Description Any Any

value of the attribute or item corresponding to the provided key

docs.title: taskbox.Unpack.__init__(data, names)
docs.text:
A class that provides a convenient way to access attributes or items from a data object.

Parameters:

Name Type Description Default data Any

The data object from which to extract attributes or items.

required names Sequence

A sequence of attribute or item names to extract from the data object.

required

docs.title: taskbox.Unpack.__iter__()
docs.text:
Return an iterator over the attribute names with their values

Yields:

Name Type Description Any Any

values that corresponds to the attribute name

docs.title: taskbox.Task
docs.text:
The Task class is used to create and manage tasks with TimeoutError.

Raises:

Type Description NotImplementedError

If the run method is not implemented by the subclass.

ValueError

If the task is not started before calling other methods.

TimeoutError

If the task exceeds the specified timeout.

docs.title: taskbox.Task.__init__(timeout=None, *, execute_requires=[])
docs.text: Initializes a new instance of the Task class.

docs.title: taskbox.Task.execute(*required)
docs.text: This method should be implemented by the subclass to define the specific task logic.

docs.title: taskbox.Task.parse_execute_requires()
docs.text:
Parses the function arguments for the task.

When Collection exists in the arguments, it will be replaced with the actual value.

docs.title: taskbox.Task.set_execute_requires(*execute_requires)
docs.text:
Sets the function arguments for the task.

Parameters:

Name Type Description Default execute_requires Any

The function arguments.

()

docs.title: taskbox.Task.set_shared_data(shared_data)
docs.text:
Sets the shared data for the task.

Parameters:

Name Type Description Default shared_data SharedData

The shared data object.

required

docs.title: taskbox.Task.set_terminate_event(terminate_data)
docs.text:
Sets the terminate data for the task.

Parameters:

Name Type Description Default terminate_data TerminatedData

The terminate data object.

required

docs.title: taskbox.Task.set_timeout(timeout)
docs.text:
Sets the timeout for the task.

Parameters:

Name Type Description Default timeout float

The timeout in seconds.

required

docs.title: taskbox.Task.start(timeout=None, wait=True, callback_func=None, error_callback_func=None)
docs.text:
Starts the task.

Parameters:

Name Type Description Default wait bool

Whether to wait for the task to finish. Defaults to True.

True callback_func Callable

The callback function to be called after the task finishes. Defaults to None.

None

Returns:

Name Type Description Any Any

None if the callback function is set, otherwise the return value of the run method.

docs.title: taskbox.Task.wait()
docs.text: Wait for the main thread to finish.

docs.title: taskbox.ParallelTaskBox
docs.text: Bases: TaskBox

docs.title: taskbox.ParallelTaskBox.error_callback(async_result)
docs.text:
Error callback function to handle any errors that occur during task execution.

Parameters:

Name Type Description Default async_result ParallelResult

The asynchronous result object.

required

docs.title: taskbox.ParallelTaskBox.wait()
docs.text: Block the main process until all tasks are completed.

docs.title: taskbox.SerialTaskBox
docs.text: Bases: TaskBox

docs.title: taskbox.SerialTaskBox.start(timeout=None, callback_func=None)
docs.text: Start executing the tasks in the TaskBox.
